mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOP_JACKET(IMGNAME, PRODUCTNAME, STOCK, PDESCRIBE, PRICE) VALUES (#{imgName}, #{productName}, #{stock}, #{pdescribe}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTID, IMGNAME, PRODUCTNAME, STOCK, PDESCRIBE, PRICE FROM TOP_JACKET ORDER BY PRODUCTID DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT PRODUCTID, IMGNAME, PRODUCTNAME, STOCK, PDESCRIBE, PRICE FROM TOP_JACKET WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TOP_Jacket SET STOCK = STOCK - #{stock} WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId}
UPDATE TOP_JACKET SET PRODUCTNAME = #{productName}, STOCK = #{stock}, PDESCRIBE = #{pdescribe}, PRICE = #{price} WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productId}
